messages.content:
Hi, I am Plugin Pal - your WordPress plugin assistant!
 To begin, please describe the plugin you want to create.

Absolutely—what kind of calculator do you have in mind? For example: loan/mortgage, price quote, ROI, BMI, tax/VAT, savings, unit converter, date/duration, or a custom formula. Please share the inputs you want, what the result should show, and where you’d like it on your site.

requirements.name: Site Calculator
requirements.description: A calculator for visitors on your site
requirements.details: Create a simple, clean calculator that visitors can use on a page. Exact calculator type and fields are not yet defined. Results should display instantly after the user enters values. Works well on mobile and desktop. Minimal styling to match the site’s look. Admin can set labels, default values, and a short result message. Placement on a chosen page/section.

messages.content: A share calculator for friends etc when they go to restruants
Great idea! Do you want it to handle uneven splits (e.g., one person pays more) or just equal splits? Also, any preferred default tip options (for example 10%, 15%, 20%)?

requirements.name: Restaurant Bill Splitter
requirements.description: Split a restaurant bill among friends with tip and tax
requirements.details: Provide a clean bill-splitting tool for a page where visitors enter bill total, optional tax %, choose a tip %, and set number of people. Support two modes: split equally or use custom shares (percent or amount) to handle uneven contributions. Show per-person totals including tax and tip, with an optional round-up/down toggle. Mobile-friendly, fast updates as values change, and simple styling that matches the site. Admin can set default tip choices, default tax handling (included or %), enable/disable custom shares, rounding options, labels/placeholders, and where it appears on the site.

messages.content: Perfect—we’ll make it very flexible with equal or custom splits, tip, tax, rounding, and a clear per-person summary. I’ve got everything I need; I’ll start the plugin generation now—please sit tight.

requirements.name: Restaurant Bill Splitter
requirements.description: Flexible bill split calculator with tip, tax, and custom shares
requirements.details: Add a mobile-friendly bill splitter where visitors enter bill total, optional tax (included or %), choose a tip %, and number of people. Supports equal split or fully custom shares by amount or percentage per person, with validation so totals match. Shows a clear summary: subtotal, tax, tip, grand total, and each person’s share. Includes optional round up/down per person or overall, and an optional service charge line. Currency symbol follows the site locale. Admin can set default tip choices (e.g., 10%, 15%, 20%), default tax handling, enable/disable custom shares and rounding, customize labels/placeholders, and choose where it appears. Instant updates as values change.
